record.dc:title: 74ML4C, 15ML4C, Marshall County, Kentucky. Jonathan Creek. Features 36, 37, 35, 33, 11, 75, 72.
record.dc:creator: J.R. Foster
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Feature 36 in foreground. Features 37 and 35 in middle foreground. Feature 33 in background. Feature 11 in left background. Feature 75, a trench type structure is shown at the right. Feature 72, individual mold structure is in the extreme background. The trench in the background is cutting into the south wall of Feature 72. See sketch. Taken from Northwest.
